doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Galle Hettiarachchige Anil Jayantha And other Vs The Director General of Commission to Investigate Allegation of Bribery and Corruption before Hon. P. Kumararatnam, J.
